biography: Erynn Dalton is an American film director, producer and actress, known for directing the gothic horror feature film "The Gravedigger" (2019), starring in and producing Passing Fancy (2005) and appearing in Blowback (2000). Ms. Dalton resides in Fort Lauderdale, Florida where she owns and operates a theater that produces live horror shows, which she directs and often co-writes.
name: Erynn Dalton
